message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit higher than I'm willing to pay right now.  I'd be happy to buy it for $100.
I understand you're looking for a better price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $110. What do you think?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $110 is still a bit high for me. I'm ready to buy right now for $105.  Let's finalize this deal.
I'm glad you're serious about buying the product, Bob! I can see you're trying to get a good deal. I'm willing to meet you at $115, but I'm not going to go any lower than that. What do you think?
